channel.title: Okay..well um i cant run my server because when i go to runserver the box exits
channel.description: Well, i cant runmy server because the black box that is supposed to open when u click runserver dosnt stay open.. it just shuts, and i have tried everythingon the forums nothing seems to work, maybe i tried somthing and did it wrong? i just want som1 to help please. and i used and auto clicker to click the box, and i figured out that it said inside somthing like, 'java' was not recognized as an internal or external command' and.. at first my compiler wouldnt work, so sombody told me to edit my enviorment labels and i realized that the 2 enviorment labels werent there, so i added them with the right values and everything.. thought that was the problem by a chance, then i went to run my server and it emediatly closed theblack box, saying 'java' was not found as an internal or external command.. and i have tried many things, as i said b4. but maybe i didnt do somthing right?

item.title: Okay..well um i cant run my server because when i go to runserver the box exits

@kid2kewl2bereal wrote:

no… wait what…? damn i sound retarded
